responsibilities: Collaborate with and learn from experienced professionals and highly skilled colleagues.
Develop software intended for software product testing.
Maintain Continuous Integration - Continuous Development environments.
skills: Desire to learn and develop technical and professional skills.
Willingness to share ideas and challenge the status quo.
Good communication skills in English as a minimum.
Solid programming skills, preferably in C/C++, PHP, JavaScript, Python, Robot Framework.
Experience with Linux OS and shell scripting is a plus.
Knowledge of functional programming is a plus.
Experience and knowledge of the Agile development process.
analysis: The job responsibilities include collaborating with professionals, analyzing data, developing software for product testing, and maintaining CI/CD environments. The skills required are programming in languages like C/C++, PHP, JavaScript, Python, and knowledge of Linux OS, shell scripting, and Agile development. There is no mention of working with Generative AI or language models. The focus is on software development, testing, and maintaining development environments, which are not specific to GenAI or LLMs.
